command.name: clear-rib
command.abstract: clear the routes from all the routers

description.p: This command clears the routes from all the routers. That means that every router's Loc-RIB and Adj-RIBs are emptied.

see-also.p: A similar command clears the routing Adj-RIBs but keeps the content of the Loc-RIBs: bgp clear-adj-ribbgp_clear-adj-rib.
